DOC.brief_summary: Respiratory distress syndrome ( RDS ) common respiratory disorder preterm infant . Despite improved survival extremely premature infant RDS , complication related mechanical ventilation still occur . This trial attempt maintain adequate gas exchange rapid rate , short inspiratory time , low tidal volume , low peak inspiratory pressure infant respiratory distress require mechanical ventilation . A cross design use test hypothesis whether mid-frequency ventilation preterm infant RDS require mechanical ventilation reduce peak inspiratory pressure requirement compare conventional mechanical ventilation .
DOC.brief_title: Feasibility Mid-frequency Ventilation Newborns With RDS : Randomized Crossover Pilot Trial
DOC.criteria: Inborn newborn infant birthweight great equal 500gms , gestational age great equal 24 week less equal 36 week . Postnatal age less equal 7 day . Infant respiratory distress syndrome ( RDS ) mechanical ventilation less equal 60 breaths/minute , initially require great equal 30 % FiO2 . Written informed consent . Blood culture positive sepsis , life threaten congenital anomaly , cyanotic congenital heart disease , hydrops fetalis , outborn infant , non viability determine attend physician , newborn consider unstable study enrollment per neonatology attending/fellow .
